result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. BRIAN E KROPELIN

records.addlTxt: Second appearance on December 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:20 AM Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN appeared by video.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is working on getting an attorney and believes when he gets his sign-on bonus he will be able to use that money as a retainer. Court schedules Status of Counsel for December 13, 2022 at 10:00 AM 

Court adjourned at 10:22 AM
Second appearance on October 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:08 AM Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN appeared by video.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he is working on getting an attorney. Court states he will give the defendant approximately 30 more days to get an attorney. Court sets second appearance for October 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Court adjourned at 10:10 AM.
Second appearance on September 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN appeared by video.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by defendant, has 2 meetings with attorneys scheduled for this week. Court sets for Status of Counsel on September 7, 2022 at 10:30 AM. Court has no problem with defendant appearing via zoom.
Second appearance on August 16, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN appeared by video.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by defendant regarding counsel, is waiting to hear back from an attorney that he contacted. Court will set for Status of Counsel on August 16, 2022 at 3:15 PM

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN appeared by video.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by defendant, does not have an attorney at this time but after probation period at work is done, is able to get an attorney. Court sets for Status of Counsel on July 19, 2022 at 10:00 am
Second appearance scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on July 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Second appearance on May 31, 2022 at 10:15 am.

10:24 AM Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN appeared by video.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he does not qualify for the public defender nor has he attempted to get an attorney. Defendant requests a court appointed attorney. Court informs the defendant on how to apply and that he needs to at least attempt to hire two attorneys first. Court will set for status of counsel for May 31, 2022 at 10:15 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:25 AM.

Def called and stated he was unable to make it to his court appearance today as his roommate tested positive for covid. I told the defendant I was reading the court record and saw that he called in yesterday and requested zoom instructions as he didn't have a ride for court. I verified that he now had a ride but now has come in contact with covid? Def stated that his roommate is the one who was going to give him a ride and she is the one who now tested positive for covid. Def was given zoom information.
Defendant called stating he was not able to make court today as he has no ride and is in Waukesha. Informed the defendant that his hearing was tomorrow at 10:00 AM and we would see him then.
Second appearance on May 3, 2022 at 10:00 am.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

8:58 AM Defendant BRIAN E KROPELIN in court.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count and as repeater. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney. DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.   Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of counsel on May 3, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:01 AM
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
